title: Convenient building amenities! Trash disposal chutes and more!
posting_body: ['Lofts at Farmers Market', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '260 5th St E', 'St. Paul, MN 55101', 'show contact info', "Lofts at Farmers Market offers studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans that are elegantly designed with the modern conveniences that you're searching for.", 'Each unit comes with spectacular high ceilings, modern stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, cozy kitchen islands with sleek granite counters, and a full-sized washer and dryer.', 'Our community amenities also make the Lofts an exceptional place to live.', 'Work out in our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy the views from our green rooftop terrace complete with fire pit and grill.', 'Before work, be sure to stop by our coffee bar to help start the day off right.', "We're also a pet-friendly community, welcoming cats and certain dog breeds.", 'We even have an on-site pet washing station to keep your furry friend looking and smelling great!', 'Bedrooms: Studio |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 503 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1325/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ Barbecue Area', '➢ Coffee Bar', '➢ Free Weight Equipment', '➢ Guest Parking', '➢ On-Line Payments', '➢ Pets Allowed', '➢ Renters Insurance Program', '➢ Rooftop Terrace', '➢ Social Events', '➢ Trash Chutes', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ Barbecue/Grill Area', '➢ Community-Wide WiFi', '➢ Controlled Access Building', '➢ Dry Cleaning Service Available', '➢ Pet Washing Station', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Reservable Clubhouse', '➢ Resident Lounge/ Clubroom', 'This Unit Comes With:', '➢ Baseball Field and Farmers Market Views', '➢ Double Pane Windows', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Kitchen Island', '➢ Linen Closet*', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Pantry*', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Smoke Free Community', '➢ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Find us on the southwest corner of 5th St E & Wall St next door to Big River Pizza!', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'EF57BD46DB5D403']
